inn1.comm: swings away from the left-hander, the batsman stays on the back foot and pulls his bat out of the line
back of length delivery on off stump, Farhat stands tall and punches it back to the bowler
on the pads and swings in a touch too, Farhat clips it fine on the leg side
fuller length delivery just outside off, the batsman lets it go through, it reaches the keeper ankle high
back of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman stands tall and works it to square leg
keeps it accurate outside off, Farhat shoulders arms
bowls a low full-toss outside off, Many thanks says Hafeez as he just has to push this through the gap at cover
bowls a slower delivery on the middle and leg stump line, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman crashes it off the front foot, but Behaardien leaps in the air at cover to slow it down and prevent a boundary
bowls it on the middle and leg line and Farhat flicks it fine on the leg side for a single
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman doesn't bother touching it, left alone
another length delivery angling across the right-hander, left alone by Hafeez
back of length just outside off, the batsman arches back to make some room and cuts it hard, but backward point makes a half-stop
bowls short of length on the pads, the batsman defends it towards midwicket
length delivery just outside off, it stays low and goes to the keeper on the bounce, left alone by the batsman
back of length on target, Hafeez gets right behind it and defends it solidly back down the pitch

caught at second slip! First strike! A Steyn special, it was on a length, angling into the batsman and around off stump, the batsman had to play at that one, but the ball straightened just a bit to square up the batsman and the edge goes flying to the right of the second-slip fielder.  South Africa overtake Pakistan at the first corner.. But this is just the first lap...
back of length delivery sliding down leg side, Akmal tries to work it away but gets hit on the thigh pad
length delivery just outside off, the batsman lets it go, but this one stays very low
length delivery on the pads, the batsman is not able to get any bat on it as he tries to whip it to leg side
length delivery on off stump, he bowls it with a grunt, the batsman defends it to the off side
length delivery outside off, Farhat comes forward and pushes it to cover
length delivery on off stump, pushes to mid-on
another length delivery just outside off, Farhat pushes it to mid-off this time
141 kph, it has started swinging for him now, typical delivery, on  a length, goes like a banana, Akmal leaves it alone
another one, on a fuller length outside off, the batsman lets it go through
oh beautiful! It was a fuller length delivery and Akmal pulls out a classical cover drive..no stopping that one
full and swinging away, but it's a bit wide outside off, left alone
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman stands tall and cuts it hard, but backward point makes a good diving save to stop a certain boundary
length delivery outside off, swings further away, left alone
too straight this time and Farhat whips it past square leg, Behaardien gets  a hand to it and that slows it down
he comes forward and steers the angled delivery down to the right of third-man
loose shot by the batsman as he gets beaten by a length delivery outside off that stays a little low
pushes the length ball to the gap at cover-point for a quick single
loud appeal for lbw as the batsman walks across the stumps and gets hit in front, Tsotsobe looked very confident, but did that come back enough? Well, there was a faint inside edge..
length delivery just outside off, the batsman gets a solid inside edge this time on to his boots
starts off with a short of length delivery that takes off after pitching, the batsman ducks under it but that one flies over the head.
142 kph, back of length on off stump, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends it off the back foot
fuller delivery just outside off, angled away from the batsman, left alone by Farhat
another one that angles across the left-hander, left alone
oh there comes a corker of a delivery! Short of length and that bounces extra and beats the bat as the batsman tries to push it off the back foot
and another one, he hits it short of length and the ball goes past the outside edge, AB takes it over his head
and bowls another one on the same length, but a slightly wider line, the batsman throws his bat at that and gets beaten again
length delivery on off stump, Akmal comes forward and defends
another length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it solidly to the off side
slightly fuller and he flays that one through cover, it goes through the fielder, it was hit that hard
now he walks across to the off side and whips the length delivery down to fine leg
back of length delivery on the stumps, it is worked to the leg side with a wristy flick, straight to square leg though
punched on the up back past the non-striker for a couple of runs
bowls length outside off, the batsman lets it go through
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to deep backward square leg easily
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman comes forward and then lets it go through
back of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
another widish delivery by the bowler, the batsman goes after it and it goes past the outside edge
length delivery angling across the batsman, left alone this time
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it towards cover off the front foot

gone! It was a length delivery just outside off and the batsman tries to punch it through cover without moving his feet at all, simple catch for the keeper. Wonder if that working-over by Morkel has something to do with the way he played that one.
length delivery, teasing line outside off, Younis lets it go through
another one angling across the right-hander, Younis comes forward and lets it go through
keeps teasing him outside off, this time with a fuller delivery, Younis shows patience
bowls it on the pads, the batsman flicks it to square leg
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
length delivery outside off, draws the batsman forward but he gets a thick outside edge to third-man
quicker delivery that goes past the hip, very quick, but it's called a wide
length delivery wide outside off, the keeper takes it around his ankles as it stays low
bowls this one past the wide marker on the off side, keeper takes it high around his face...

angled in to the batsman, who drops it towards the off side and calls for a quick single, but he was struggling as the fielder from cover comes in quickly. Had it hit, he was gone. The bowler has overstepped though
makes room by moving outside leg, but this short delivery flies around head-high, he doesn't make any contact
another quick short delivery outside off, the batsman fends it towards point
another short of length delivery outside off, this time he gets on top of that and hammers it through point
length delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it to point
another length delivery outside off, the batsman is late as he tries to takes his bat away, but it hits the bat and goes past slip
strays on to the pads, the batsman is unable to get any bat on it and it hits the pads and rolls to the leg side
angled delivery on the middle stump, the batsman punches it through midwicket for a couple
fuller delivery wide outside off, the batsman comes forward and lets it go
fuller length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it towards point
short of length delivery wide outside off, another extra
he goes forward to a length delivery and opens the face, gets a thick outside edge past gully, it was not very far from him
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
gets steep bounce from short of length outside off, the batsman defends it to the off side
another back of length delivery on off, the batsman has to get up on his toes to defend that
bowls this one on the pads and Younis clips it fine on the leg side for a quick couple
walks across to the off side and defends the back of length delivery back down the pitch
goes very close to the edge as Kamran misses a square cut off a short delivery wide outside off
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman steers it to third-man for a single
length delivery on the pads, it's flicked down to fine-leg with ease
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman walks across and gets some inside edge towards leg side for a quick single
fuller delivery on the pads, he pushes it through to deep midwicket for a couple
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it off the front foot
slower delivery, very short outside off, the batsman punches it through extra cover, but the fielder at deep cover cuts it off
goes on the back foot and works the flatter delivery to deep square leg
flatter delivery on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket for a single
goes down on his knee and sweeps this one to fine-leg for a couple
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman goes back to cut, but hits it straight to point
length delivery wide outside off, it swings away a touch too, left alone by the batsman
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover-point off the back foot
beautifully driven through cover! It was full and wide, but Younis comes forward and opens the face to threat that gap at cover
length delivery outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
oh nice! It was a short of length delivery on off stump and Younis jumps up and tries to wrist it through midwicket stylishly, but finds the fielder
fuller delivery outside off, he comes forward and slices it through point
slower, tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
goes on the back foot and works it towards square leg for a single
comes forward and pushes the tossed up delivery to cover
tossed up, Kamran goes for a slog and smashes it to deep midwicket boundary
now this one is full and Akmal gets down on his knee and paddles it fine down the leg side
flatter delivery on the stumps, he goes back and punches it to deep midwicket for a single
bowls a length delivery just outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman lets it go through
length delivery just outside off, stays a touch low, the batsman defends it towards cover
this one draws the batsman forward and straightens just a touch, beats the bat
short of length delivery on the body, Younis tucks it to the leg side for a single
gets extra bounce outside off and the ball goes past the outside edge
bowls a full delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it past the non-striker for a couple
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman dabs it towards point off the back foot
length delivery on off stump, the batsman walks across and defends it towards cover
nasty delivery, it is quick and gets up on the throat of the batsman, Younis fends at it and it hits the shoulder of the bat to fly over the first-slip fielder
another short delivery, 145 kph, Kamran is down on his haunches
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman stands tall and defends it to point
length delivery outside off, Younis comes forward and pushes it to point
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to cover
length delivery outside off, this time he pushes it to the gap at extra cover for a single
short of length delivery outside off, it gets up and the batsman doesn't hold back, he cuts it in the air, to deep backward point boundary
short of length on off stump, he gets up on his toes and defends
fuller length outside off, Akmal drives away from the body and in the air, falls short of the fielder at gully
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to the off side
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends off the back foot. Steyn gives a lot of advice to the batsman about how to play, Younis just smiles back
now there is a quick bouncer outside off, it sails over the batsman. Now Steyn smiles
length delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it to point. More words from Steyn..
back of length angling in to the batsman, Younis hops and defends it to the leg side

quick delivery short of length, aimed at the body, 147 kph, the batsman tries to whip it but gets hit on the body. This time Steyn says a few things without a smile, with those eyes looking all menacing
another quick on on off stump, 147 kph, Younis jumps up and defends it back down the pitch
slightly short and it is aimed on the middle stump, but Kamran makes room and cuts it fine between backward point and short third-man, it races to the boundary
slower, very slow, tossed up on off, the batsman waits and defends
goes on the back foot as soon as he sees the short length, punches it hard to extra cover
tossed up delivery on off stump, driven to long-off for a single
very good running, the batsman just drops it towards square-leg with soft-hands, and there are three fielders converging, but they steal two. However, Akmal ran one short!
waits on the front foot and defends it down the crease
slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman falls over a bit as he tries to flick it and gets hit on the pads, but that pitched outside leg
length delivery outside off, he hammers it through cover, on the tup
length delivery just outside off, this time it is guided down to third-man for a single
shorter delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it awkwardly to the off side
he comes forward and opens the face to a length delivery towards point
back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman goes on the back foot and pushes it to cover
tossed up delivery on the stumps, driven back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and smashes the tossed up delivery, but he hits it straight into Younis Khan... That's minus four for Younis..

makes room outside off, but smashes the tossed up delivery back to the bowler, who gets a hand to it before the ball disturbs the stumps. The umpire wants to check if Younis was ok or not. Looks ok to me

caught at backward square leg! Brilliantly done by McLaren! Akmal goes for a sweep and gets a healthy top-edge towards backward square leg. McLaren back-pedals quite some distance and takes this arching backwards
full delivery on off, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
comes forward and defends the flatter delivery to the leg side
he goes for a cut, but it's too close and gets big on him, the ball takes an outside edge over the keeper
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
short delivery, Younis goes for a pull shot but doesn't get hold of it, it only goes as far as short fine-leg
oh beautifully driven off the front foot, but it's hit straight to the man at mid-off
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman lets it go through
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman goes forward and drives it straight to cover
length delivery outside off, cut to deep point off the back foot
length delivery outside off, it's cut straight to point
length delivery, but wide outside off, it is punched to deep cover off the back foot

oh what a catch! caught at midwicket. It was a long-hop on off stump and Younis swivels on his heels and murders it towards midwicket, but the only thing he doesn't get his elevation and Amla times his jump to pluck it out of nowhere, excellent catch
shorter length delivery on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
wider delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover for a single
bowls this one on the pads and it's easily flicked to deep backward square leg
fuller length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and punches it to mid-off
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman hops and chops it to point
another back of length delivery outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends
teases him with a length delivery wide outside off, Shoaib lets it go through
this time he finds the gap at point with a back foot punch, keeps the strike
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
another length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it straight to mid-off, but a misfield allows a single
back of length on off stump, Misbah goes back and whips it to deep square leg for a single
stays on the back foot and cuts it late to third-man
he comes forward and drives it to mid-off off a length delivery
slightly wider outside off, the batsman pushes it to point
length delivery outside off, comes in a touch, Shoaib lets it go through
bowls this one on the pads and Shoaib makes full use of the opportunity, flicks it away with a lot of timing through square leg
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it to cover
length delivery, but this very wide, Shoaib stretches out and gets a lot of bat on that, but he is unable to beat the fielder at point
short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman hops up and tucks it towards square leg
short of length delivery outside off, Misbah lets it go through
comes straight out and whacks the flighted delivery over midwicket, he picked it up from outside off and sends this one into the crowd
full and flighted, it is driven to deep midwicket for another couple
goes on the back foot and punches the flatter delivery through square leg for a single
pushed through on off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and punches it down to long-on
and another punch down to long-on, another single
full and flighted outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it down to long-off
bowls a fuller delivery on the middle stump line, pushed towards midwicket for a single
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman stays in the crease and defends it to off
short of length delivery just outside off, Shoaib jumps on his toes and guides it to third-man for a single
he stands up on his toes and whips the short of length delivery to deep backward square leg for a single
another one tucked away towards square leg from outside off, lot of wristy work there
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it straight to cover off the back foot
full delivery on the pads, it is pushed towards deep midwicket, the batsmen think about two, but settle for one
length delivery on off, the batsman tucks it to midwicket for a single
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to long-on for a single
walks across the stumps and gets hit on the gloves as he looks for a flick, it goes to short fine leg
fuller delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and punches it to long-off
slightly wide, the batsman punches it off the back foot and finds the point fielder
length delivery on off, the batsman again goes back and tucks it to midwicket for a single
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to gully
length delivery on off stump, 140.5 kph, the batsman defends it to the off side
short of length delivery just outside off, the batsman sways out of the way
quick short ball, this one goes way over the head of the batsman
now he gets some width and carves it through backward point, he arched back to get his placement behind square
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends off the back foot
goodish length on the off, rocks forward, defends towards point, has been sent back by Misbah
shortish outside off, two points in place and Malik bisects that gap, just the single though
goodish length, gets forward and defends that to the right of extra cover
inside edged, pushed it full, Misbah moved across to flick that square, got an inside edge and got it past the keeper to the fine-leg boundary, fortunate
beaten, goodish length and that's leaving the right hander, Misbah prods at that one and misses
pitched up, moves towards the ball and drives it hard down towards long-off for a single
down the leg side and called a wide, we've seen a few today
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and knocks it down behind point for a single
slightly short, drops it into the off side, wants a single but it's not there

gone, soft dismissal in the end, angling in towards middle, seemed to stop on Malik there, Malik got across and ended up chipping it straight to midwicket, was the offcutter, got it high on the bat as he closed the face
banged in short and he ducks under that one
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and drops it into the off side,took his bottom hand off that one

Afridi goes! What goes on in his head? Short on middle and he pulls, just a ball before the batting Powerplay, doesn't time it well enough and finds the lone fielder near deep square leg, Ingram takes a straightforward catch and Pakistan are in a bit of trouble now.
length delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover point

oh no, the Afridi bug has affected Misbah, he goes after this length ball but doesn't get hold of it at all, it just lobs over mid-on, then he is lucky to get back for the second in time as the throw comes in..
length delivery, more orthodox shot this time as he pushes it to cover
slower delivery outside off, the batsman waits and defends it towards point
length delivery outside off, the batsman leans on it and drives it straight to cover
full delivery, slightly slower outside off, the batsman guides it down to third-man
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to the off side
short delivery, Misbah goes for a pull, but it doesn't get up as much as he expected, hits him between his leg, but he shows no pain
length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends
slower short delivery, down the leg side, the batsman shapes for the pull, but has to wait and then he helps it along its way to fine leg
length delivery on off stump, he dabs it to the gap at cover for a quick single
goes for a yorker on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and steers it past point for a single
makes room by moving to the leg side, but the bowler bowls it slightly wide outside off, Misbah still manages to drive it to deep extra cover for a couple
goes for a cut shot without any feet movement and gets an underedge to the keepr
he moves outside leg again and again the bowler pushes it wide, but it's too wide this time
goes for a slog off a full delivery, but doesn't get hold of it, drags it to deep midwicket
slower delivery outside off, the batsman tries to steer it to third-man, but gets an outside edge which goes on the bounce to first slip
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it towards cover off the back foot
bangs it in on the body, the batsman gets up on the toes and defends to the off side
another short delivery and Misbah takes his eyes off as he defends it to the leg side
another one for McLaren! This one is a fuller length slower delivery outside off, Misbah throws his bat without making any effort to get behind the line,  and ends up edging it to the keeper.
length ball outside off, Ajmal plays a nothing waft at that one, gets beaten
shorter delivery outside off, Ajmal plays it quite well as he gets on top of the bounce, towards third-man
length delivery outside off, Wahab comes forward and pushes it to point
short of length delivery outside off, defended to the off side
short of length on the pads, it hits the thigh pad and goes to the left of the keeper, the batsman leaves the crease and AB fires a throw, had he hit, it was gone...
but it is all over this time! Morne pitches it further up, the batsman stays in the crease and tries to guide it to third-man, but it's too close and he just chops it down to his stumps
bowls a wide delivery outside off, the batsman gets a sighter..
fuller length on off stump, the batsman pushes it to mid-off
stays in the crease and tries to punch a length ball through off, but he is standing at least a meter away from the line of the ball, misses it..
this time he is closer and gets it off the middle of the bat, crashed through cover off the back foot
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to point
length delivery on the pads, it's punched to midwicket for a quick single
another back of length delivery outside off, the batsman arches back and defends it to point
short delivery flies past the outside edge..
and another short one, 145 kph, the batsman sways out of line
and another short one, but this one goes down the leg side..
there comes the fuller delivery, but the batsman manages to clip it to deep square leg for a couple
length delivery, but this is wide outside off, Wahab patiently leaves it alone
massive swing to a short of length delivery outside off, he wanted to send it to deep midwicket, but it's just too quick for him...play and a miss
length delivery on off, he comes forward this time and defends.
oi! Another short one on the body, Wahab gets up and somehow tucks it towards backward square leg
length ball on off, defended towards mid-on
hello hello, he makes room by moving outside leg and clobbers the length delivery back down the ground...Welcome runs..
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to the off side
pacy yorker outside off, the batsman is late on bringing is bat down ..it goes through to the keeper
fuller length delivery on the middle, defended towards mid-on, but midwicket intercepts it, picks it up, and throws down the stumps at the striker's end, the batsman was safely in though..
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman sways out of line
full delivery on the middle stump, dabbed towards midwicket but they pinch a single
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman hops and defends it to point
short of length delivery on off, the batsman jumps up and defends it in front
slower delivery on off stump, the batsman spots it and defends it to cover
bowls a low full-toss on off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover and they take a quick single

short delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it to mid-on and think about a run, but Amla comes in from midwicket, slides and turns to hit the non-striker. The batsmen had fortunately given up the idea of running earlier...
bowls a slower bouncer outside off, the batsman slaps it to long-on
goes on the back foot and guides the short of length delivery to third-man
tosses it up outside off, the batsman sweeps it powerfully to deep square leg where the fielder makes a good sliding stop
pushed through on off, the batsman pushes it to long-on
tossed up delivery on off stump, steered to short third-man
this one is flatter and the batsman guides it to the right of short third-man, they nick a single
short and slow on off stump, the batsman punches it to deep cover
flatter and quicker on off, punched to deep cover
goes for a yorker outside off and the batsman is unable to get any bat on that..
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman sways out of line
slower delivery on off, the batsman waits for it and opens the face to runs it down to third man
bowls a low full-toss on off, the batsman gets on outside edge to the left of third-man
short of length delivery on the body, the batsman tucks it fine on the leg side for a single
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman slaps it to long-on

the batsman dabs the flatter delivery to square leg, but Wahab runs halfway down the pitch. It didn't look like a run at all, the throw comes in from the fielder, and the batsman is nowhere near. Robbie P actually breaks the stumps with his leg, but he realises that in time, so uproots the stump to complete the run out. Wahab was still nowhere near.
pushed through on off stump, defended back to the bowler
super shot, he moves his front leg out and clubs it straight over the bowler's head. That hit the ropes on the full
and goes again, but he gets an outside edge this time to third-man
shorter and flatter, it rears up from nowhere, hits the gloves and then the front grill..
bowls it full this time, the batsman wanted to smack it over the bowler's head, but ends up pushing it to long-on as the length was too full
short of length delivery outside off, bounces over the bat as the batsman tries to cut it
another short of length delivery on off, defended back to the bowler
fullish delivery on the stumps, it is flicked down to fine leg
comes down the track and hits the full delivery straight to midwicket
full delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler, who deflects it to mid-off
bowls a low full-toss, Irfan bends down and pushes it to the bowler, who throws it back at him. Irfan stands unmoved
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman sways out of line
length delivery on the pads, the batsman is unable to get any bat on that, but they run a leg-bye
well, probably you can, Steyn bangs it short and Irfan sways out of line
that's a drop by Amla at first-slip. It was a full delivery outside off and the batsman gets a solid edge to the left of Amla, who palms it away to the boundary
another short delivery, the batsman sways away. Can he duck under these?
another short delivery, aimed at the throat, the batsman somehow fends it off to the off side, gets hit on the gloves
and another quick short ball on the body, Irfan stuck his bat out but he had no idea where that went. It lobbed up on off side but dropped down before anyone could get close
bowls a length delivery, Junaid goes for a big swing, misses, and the ball knocks the middle stump back.

inn2.comm: good delivery to start off, it is angled across the right hander, just outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
another steepler, the batsman leaves it alone and the ball climbs at the keeper, who gets a hand to it, but can't hold on
length delivery outside off, this one doesn't bounce much, left alone by the batsman
another one takes off from just short of length, the batsman sways out of line
this one is wider outside off, the batsman stays away from it and the keeper takes it in front of his face
back of length delivery on the body, de Kock defends it towards the off side
back of length delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman misses his flick shot and gets hit on the thigh pad
stays on the back foot and defends the shortish delivery back to the bowler
good delivery outside off and well left by the batsman. It was on a length just outside off, swings a touch away and stays low too..
another length delivery that leaves the batsman, Amla stays away from it

back of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman tries to whip it to leg but gets hit on the pads, loud appeal for lbw, the umpire says not out, but Pakistan are going for a review. The ball doesn't touch the bat, but the batsman was hopping on his toes..It pitches outside leg stump, so a bad review by Pakistan. They lose their only one..
bowls it from wide of the crease and angles it in into the left-hander, de Kock defends it off the back foot back to the bowler
length delivery on off stump, 144 kph, very accurate, the batsman defends it to the off side
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman goes on the back foot and punches it to point
fuller length on off, Amla comes forward and drives it to mid-off
back of length delivery outside off, it is steered down to third-man for a single
bowls it just short of length and it gets up to the throat of the batsman, the batsman defends it awkwardly to the leg side
a bit of width outside off and he goes for a cut shot, but hits it straight to the fielder at point
he finds the gap with a smooth square drive off a length ball outside off, bisects the little gap between point and cover perfectly
now full on the pads and he whips it towards midwicket, where the fielder gets a hand to it and slows it down a bit
another shout for lbw again, as the batsman gets hit on the pads after he misses his flick, but this one was pitching outside leg stump..No reviews left anyway
short ball outside off and the batsman almost plays a false shot, it hits the shoulder of the bat as Amla goes for a pull, but drops short of midwicket
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to off side
left delivery on off stump, Amla stands tall and punches it square on off side, straight to point though
slightly wide and the batsman cracks it to the off side, but Shoaib at cover makes a diving save..
this one is short and on the body, de Kock hops up and somehow defends it down the pitch
another short of length delivery on off, he drops it on the off side and calls for a quick single, Shoaib comes in quickly and fires it at the non-striker's, had he hit, de Kock was a gonner
trusts the bounce on the pitch as he leaves the length delivery on off stump, it goes over the stumps
length delivery on off, 145 kph, defended off the back foot
oh, it was short of length on the body, and the batsman tries to sway away from the line, but the ball doesn't bounce as much as expected, hits him on the left-arm
length delivery outside off, this time de Kock finds the gap at extra cover with a gentle push

chopped on! This one is fuller outside off and de Kock tries to force it to the off side without ever moving his feet. His front foot is nowhere near the line of the ball, the ball takes an inside edge and splays the stumps behind him.. Disappointment for the young batsman
length delivery honing in on off stump, Ingram gets back and defends it back to the bowler
this one is fuller length outside off and straightens a bit too, Ingram goes for a drive and gets beaten
and again he goes for a drive at a fuller one, but ends up slicing it to the left of third-man
shortish delivery on off, Ingram goes on the back foot and defends solidly
back of length delivery on off, Amla drops it to the off side and starts off, but is sent back in time
length delivery angling across the batsman, left alone by the batsman
short of length outside off, this time as well he takes away his bat out of the line
length delivery on off, the batsman just caresses it through extra cover. It was a mere push, but it speeds across the turf
length delivery on off stump, 143 kph, defended to the leg side
bowls this short of length, and Amla arches back to allow it to go through..
length delivery outside off, the batsman stays on the back foot and defends
fuller length delivery outside off, Ingram goes for a forceful drive, but doesn't time it at all, it goes in the gap at cover though
full delivery on the pads, easier for Ingram as he clips it towards deep midwicket
another length delivery wide outside off and the batsman tries to force a drive from the crease, chops it towards the keeper
now this one stays a little low after pitching short of length, goes under the bat as the batsman looks to defend off the back foot
length delivery wide outside off, Ingram stays in the crease and cracks it to deep backward point
back of length delivery on off stump, 145 kph, the batsman defends it off the back foot
goes fuller on off but Ingram was ready for that, he comes forward and drives it down the ground past the non-striker
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot to cover
angles it in from wide of crease, the batsman defends it off the back foot towards the leg side
short delivery on the body, 143 kph, the batsman ducks under it in time..
it sure is not affecting him as he cracks this full and wide  delivery over cover-point and it goes for a one-bounce four
back of length on off stump, defended to cover off the back foot
bowls it full on the middle stump looking for some swing, but there isn't any, Amla drives it hard to mid-on
and he loses direction as he pushes this one down the leg side
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and defends it to the leg side
length delivery outside off, the batsman stands tall and punches it to the fielder at short cover
good delivery as it rears up on the batsman from short of length, he drops it towards the leg side and calls for a quick single
length delivery from wide of the crease, defended off the front foot
tossed up outside off, the batsman shuffles across and defends it to the leg side
he skips down the pitch and whips it from outside off to long-on
pushed through from round the wicket, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch, but is not to the pitch of the ball, defends it towards the leg side

hits off stick! It was the quicker one on the middle stump and Ingram didn't know whether to go back or come forward, he is late as he tries to go back and tries to cut it behind square, gets an outside edge on to his off stump
flatter delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and punches it hard to long-on
length delivery on off stump, AB punches it to mid-off with ease
another length delivery on off, the batsman punches it back to the bowler, who throws it back at the batsman, it hits the pads, Junaid apologises

he draws the edge with a full length delivery outside off, ABdV gets a thick outside edge and it goes straight to Younis who drops it..It was in his palms, regulation slip catch..He is distraught for dropping that, he is a very good slip fielder, Younis
tries to whip a short of length delivery to the leg side but gets hit on the thigh pad
length delivery on the stumps, AB gets solidly behind that in defence

oye! Was this close to the fielder at short cover? It was a length delivery on off and AB cracks it on the up, his one hand coming off the handle, but the ball just flies. No, it wasn't close to the fielder, just a good shot, very good shot
bowls short of length on the off, defended back to the bowler
he hops on his toes and works the angled delivery towards square leg for a single
back of length outside off, the batsman tries to steer it to third man but gets cramped for room
length delivery wide outside off, ABdV lets this one go through
oye another one that takes off from a length, the batsman does well to get out of the way but the keeper has to jump up to get a hand on that...
oh my! Squares him up with a brute of a delivery on off, it takes the shoulder of the bat and flies almost all the way to third-man..
pushed through on the leg stump, the batsman is unable to get it away
tossed up outside off, it spins a touch, the batsman punches it to long-on for a single
Amla plays a premeditated paddle down to fine-leg
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman punches it back to the bowler off the back foot
he allows the ball to turn and then nudges it down to fine-leg
pushed through on the off stump line, this one doesn't turn as much, Amla flicks it to square leg
length delivery outside off, the batsman tentatively defends it to the off side
fuller delivery outside off, he comes forward and drives it with an open face, to deep point
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and defends it back down the pitch
another one angled in from round the wicket, Amla goes back and works it towards midwicket
back of length delivery outside off stump, the batsman defends it towards the off side
he goes on the back foot and opens the face to steer the short of length delivery down to third-man
tossed up delivery and the batsman goes for the paddle immediately, he plays it in the air and it goes almost all the way to short fine leg
pushes this one down the leg side, spins further away
tossed up outside off, now AB gets an outside edge to the off side (it wasn't close to Younis at first slip), Shoaib boots it in at the boundary
full and flighted on off, driven to midwicket
bowls it on the pads, it is clipped to deep midwicket with ease
he comes down the pitch, and almost yorks himself, but he manages to push it down to long-on

beautifully bowled! How did that miss the stumps! It was tossed up outside off, it dipped in very quickly as Amla went for the drive and squeezes between the bat and pad, goes over the stumps. A stumping chance missed too as Akmal gets surprised by that too..It hits him on his chest
short of length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it through cover off the back foot
tries to whip it to the leg side, but gets a leading edge back to the bowler
bowls a short of length delivery outside off and it bounces a bit extra, the batsman somehow defends it to the leg side, it was in the air for a bit as it goes towards midwicket
straying on to the pads, the batsman doesn't get any bat on that as that one rolls towards fine-leg
back of length delivery outside off, ABdV glides it past the keeper. It would have been a straightforward catch for first-slip, except there is no one there now...
length delivery, dabbed towards cover and he calls for a quick single
tossed up outside off and ABdV now pulls out his reverse-sweep and plays it really well, just helps the ball to the third-man boundary
he pulls the length back a bit and AB works it to the leg side, towards deep midwicket
full and flighted delivery on off, the batsman drives it down to long-on
spins in to the batsman from outside off, AB goes back and punches it to deep point for a single
another good delivery, loopy delivery, comes in sharply into the batsman who gets cramped for room as he goes for the cut
flatter delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
length delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to mid-off
bowls a fuller and slower delivery on off, the batsman waits for it and punches it to mid-off
back of length delivery, 142 kph, angled in from wide of the crease, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
back of length outside off, the batsman punches it to mid-off
bowls a good short delivery from round the wicket, but it goes over the head of the batsman
full delivery outside off, the batsman drives it with an open face to the man at deep cover
back of length delivery on the stumps, he goes back and tucks it to deep midwicket
bowls a quick one and the batsman gets hit on the pads, loud appeal for lbw, but that was slipping down the leg side
he goes back and punches it to deep cover
oh Amla had no clue about that one! It was a googly and it turned into the batsman, misses leg stump, misses Akmal and goes to the boundary
now he comes down the pitch and puts his pad in line
shorter length, bounces a touch extra too, the batsman defends it to the off side
he comes forward and drives the flighted delivery to cover
bowls length on the pads, it is flicked down to fine-leg easily
short of length wide outside off, the batsman lets it go through to the keeper
short of length delivery on the body, the batsman tries to pull it but gets hit high on the bat, goes straight to midwicket
he flicks this one down to deep backward square leg for a single
full delivery on off stump, AB drives it to wide mid-off for a quick single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
tossed up on the pads, drifts in a bit and the batsman comes down the track, pushes it to mid-on
flighted on off and middle stump, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler, who is not able to stop it cleanly
short and wide outside off, the batsman stays back and cuts it hard to deep point
flighted delivery and the batsman gets beaten by the length as he goes by the drive, it takes an inside edge on to his pads
full and flighted, driven down to long-off
he skips down the track and Afridi shortens the length, defended back to the bowler
length ball on off, Amla punches it to mid-off
back of length delivery on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
another length delivery on off stump, defended back to the bowler, it stayed a touch low too

caught by Malik! Here comes the big fish in the net! It was a short of length delivery and Amla goes for a pull, and gets a healthy top-edge that shoots up in the air right above him, a number of fielders converge, but it is taken by Malik coming in from midwicket
length delivery angling in from wide of crease, the batsman gets squared up in his defence as it stays a touch low
short of length outside off, ABdV chops it down to third-man for a single
another good delivery from Afridi, it slides on with the arm and the batsman gets an inside edge on to his pads
enough is enough, AB walks down the crease and slams it over long-on, done with ease
bowls this down the leg side and AB works it in the gap at deep square leg for a couple
pushed through outside off, stays a bit low as the batsman mistimes his cut shot
short delivery on off stump, he punches it to deep cover for a single
short delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler, Afridi fires a throw back to the keeper
length delivery on the stumps, solidly defended by the batsman
back of length outside off, the batsman cuts it to deep point off the back foot
back of length delivery on the body, Behaardien punches it to wide mid-on and calls for a quick single
cracker of a delivery, gets up from a length and the batsman somehow plays it towards third-man
and this one bounces extra too, Farhan defends it towards point off the outside half of the bat
some width this time and Farhan hops on his toes to get on top of that one and he punches it through to the cover boundary, excellent back foot shot
he starts moving around the crease before the ball is bowled, but finally drives it through point and finds the gap in the deep
gets beaten with the bounce off this short delivery
tossed up delivery on off, he drives it to deep cover for a single
full delivery on the stumps, Farhan drives it past the bowler to mid-off
short delivery, and he stands tall and punches it to deep cover to bring up yet another half-century. What a player
it slides down the leg side and hits the pads of the batsman, they all go up in appeal, but that was going down leg side
length delivery outside off, the batsman goes for a forceful drive but gets a healthy inside edge past square leg, Shoaib runs after it and keeps it in
length delivery on off stump, punched straight back past the non-striker, Afridi at mid-off slides to stop that one
fuller delivery outside off, Farhan whips it through midwicket for a couple, no it's three runs, good sharp running by the two
back of length delivery on off, pushed to mid-on
back of length on the stumps, AB tucks it to deep square leg for a single
he pushes it to mid-off and calls for a quick single, they took on Afridi there, but the throw was wayward
tossed up delivery, the batsman comes forward and gets hit on the pad as the ball spins in, loud appeal for lbw, but the umpire turns it down
walks across the stumps and works it to deep square leg for a single
bowls a quicker one on the middle and AB paddles it down to fine-leg with ease
he goes back and dabs the ball at cover, says NO to the non-striker after a delay
goes on the back foot and dabs it towards cover point for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, spins in to the batsman and keeps a bit low, AB drives it to mid-on off the toe-end as the ball stays a touch low
he bowls length outside off, Farhan plays a smart shot, a chip through extra cover to the boundary
this time he tries to work it to the leg side , but gets a leading edge down to third-man
full and wide, AB gets down on his knees and looks for that extra cover boundary, but finds the fielder at cover
short of length delivery, but this one is pushed down the leg side
bowls back of length on off stump, punched back to the bowler
bowls it on the stumps, the batsman tucks it past midwicket for a single
short of length delivery on off stump, the batsman sways out of line
pushed through on the stumps, flicked away to deep backward square with the spin
walks across the stumps and works the flatter delivery to deep square leg
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman nudges it to deep midwicket
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman stretches out and pushes it to mid-off, they call for a quick single and completes it easily
waits for the ball to turn and punches it to wide mid-on for a single
he goes on the back foot and defends the quicker delivery to the off side
length delivery on off stump, he stays on the back foot and lashes it to deep cover, just a single though
short ball on off stump, Farhan pulls it over midwicket, didn't get much timing, but gets it in the gap
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to the off side
another unconvincing shot as the batsman gets a leading edge towards the leg side, it drops in no-man's land
short delivery aimed on the head and AB bends down and slaps it off his face to deep square leg boundary, incredible..
length delivery on off stump, dabbed towards cover for a single
tossed up on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
pushes this one down the leg side from round the wicket, called a wide
flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman is unable to get any bat on that
flighted delivery on off, the batsman drives it off the front foot to midwicket
he comes forward and defends it solidly back to the bowler
pushed through on the middle stumps line, the batsman clips it to the leg side, to Hafeez at backward square leg
another quicker one on the middle stump, pushes to midwicket
bowls a slider and it stays a bit low, the batsman gets the bat down in time
this time he stays on the back foot and punches the length delivery back to the bowler
another one angling into the stumps, pushed to mid-on off the back foot
slightly outside off and Farhan pushes it to deep cover to rotate strike
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long-off
huge shout for lbw as this one hits the batsman on the pads as he looks to clip in on the leg side, it was sliding down leg and did it straighten enough? I don't think so.
bowls short and he is smashed to the cow corner
he skips down the track and drives the full delivery to wide mid-on for a single
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman drives it down to long-on to bring up the 150 of the team
another full delivery outside off, the batsman punches it to long-on
tossed up delivery on off, it is pushed to midwicket with the turn
he walks across the stumps and turns the flatter delivery to midwicket
floated up outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a quick couple
flatter delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover where Hafeez makes a good stop
flighted and full, driven down to long-off for a single
slightly flatter on the stumps, the batsman goes back and works it to square leg
goes to cut a not-so-short delivery, gets beaten as the ball stays low
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to deep cover for a single
the batsman moves outside leg, the bowler follows him, it is pushed back to the bowler who then fires it back to the stumps..
bowls it flat on the stumps, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket off the back foot
nice delivery, it was tossed up and going across the batsman, it gets an outside edge as the batsman goes back to defends, it runs fine on the off side
on the pads, AB misses his flick and gets hit on the pads, it rolls to short fine leg
he goes back and tucks it straight to square leg

tossed up delivery on the middle stump, Farhan chooses to go for a reverse sweep, he misses and gets hit in front. He calls for a review immediately, perhaps more in hope than anything. Looks like it has hit his glove on the way, and where has it pitched? probably in line with leg stump. But this is glove first and then pad.. So he should be safe
bowls slightly wide outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to gully

length delivery on off and how did he find boundary with that! He just opens the face and places it in the gap between gully and backward point, it beats the fielder at third-man with ease too.. This is wrong, just wrong, how can he hit boundaries like that!
walks across the stumps and punches the length delivery to mid-on
again walks across the stumps and punches the length ball back to the bowler, who parries it towards mid-off
here comes the edge of a full delivery outside off, but Younis is not at first-slip, he is at gully.. four runs

where has this gone! caught at fine-leg! He shuffles around the crease and tries to send  the short of length delivery on the body on it's way to the fine-leg boundary, but gets a bit of top-edge that goes up high and settles into the palms of Ajmal at fine-leg. Has this come too late?
pushed through on the stumps, he defends it back to the bowler
another quick delivery on the stumps, defended again
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
on the pads, he clips it straight to square leg
pushed through on the stumps, AB goes back and punches it to long-on for a single
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover
bowls full on the leg stump, Miller pushes it to midwicket and gets AB back on strike
he walks way across on the off side and works the length delivery towards midwicket
bowls a wild wide outside off. He was trying to roll his fingers on that and just slipped out of his hands
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman is slow to come forward on the drive, gets beaten
short delivery on the body, the batsman ducks under it in time
back of length delivery, the batsman drops it close to his boot and AB calls for a quick single from the other end
length ball on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
flatter delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it straight to backward point
tossed up delivery and they pinch a single even though everyone is close in on the off side
he moves outside the leg stump, but punches the flatter delivery down the ground to long-on
this one goes through the batsman, hits Kamran on his right shoulder, the batsman was completely beaten by that one
this one hits the pads and Kamran takes the bails off, but the batsman was in the crease
another one down the leg side, this doesn't touch anything on the way
he goes back and punches it to wide mid-on
pushed through on off stump, the batsman chops it to short cover off the back foot
quicker delivery on the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
hits the pads as the batsman comes forward, loud appeal but that was sliding down the leg side
he comes down the pitch and dabs it towards midwicket for a single
pushed through on off stump, AB easily punches it down to long-on for a single
he goes back to the quicker delivery and defends it towards midwicket
he skips down the track but doesn't get any bat on it, the ball hits the pads and goes to short fine leg
flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman works it straight to backward square leg
fuller length on the pads, hit straight to the same fielder
another one on the pads, it's flicked to short fine-leg this time
he goes on the back foot and punches the quicker delivery to short cover
pushed through on the stumps, AB defends it solidly to midwicket
comes down the track, gets under the ball and sends it over the deep midwicket boundary, easily done
pushed through on the stumps, the batsman punches it to mid-on
goes for a sweep, but misses as he is hit on the pads, but it was sliding down the leg side
quicker delivery, it's full too, flicked down to fine-leg for a single
oh lovely hit through cover! It was quicker on the off stump, he waited for it on the back foot and spanks it through covers off the back foot, the fielders had no chance to move
slower this time and tossed up, he defends it towards midwicket
he walks across the stumps and punches it to deep midwicket for a single
length ball outside off, the batsman pushes it firmly through cover where the fielder dives over the ball and allows it to go through, not very good by Farhat there..
he bends down on his knee and slaps it over mid-off for a flat....six, is it? well almost, just bounces inside the boundary
a rare play and a miss by AB as he tries to push the length delivery through cover
makes room by arching his back and steers it to deep backward point for a couple, he is into the nineties
moves outside the leg side and slaps the length delivery over extra cover for a one-bounce four, take a bow AB.. what a dynamite of a player, that shot gives SA the series win
